      static void execute(ISirqulExecutor handler)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public static void execute(ISirqulExecutor handler)
        Execute any task such as Sirqul API calls without any Activity or Service context on a background thread, without a callback.
        Parameters:
        handler - an implementation of ISirqulExecutor and it's one method, executing any tasks you wish to have run on a background thread.

      • execute

        public static <T extends SirqulResponse> void execute(ISirqulExecutor handler,
                                      ISirqulCallback<T> callback)
        Execute any task such as Sirqul API calls without any Activity or Service context on a background thread, with a callback.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        handler - an implementation of ISirqulExecutor and it's one method, executing any tasks you wish to have run on a background thread.
        callback - an implementation of ISirqulCallback and it's two methods, handling success and exception results from the handler.execute().

      • execute

        public static <T extends SirqulResponse> void execute(ISirqulExecutor handler,
                                      ISirqulCallback<T> callback,
                                      ISirqulProgressListener progressListener)
        Execute any task such as Sirqul API calls without any Activity or Service context on a background thread, with a callback.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        handler - an implementation of ISirqulExecutor and it's one method, executing any tasks you wish to have run on a background thread.
        callback - an implementation of ISirqulCallback and it's two methods, handling success and exception results from the handler.execute().
        progressListener - the progress listener
